ConfidenceLevelEnum.description: Confidence level options mapped to integers

UserSubjectData.description:
Data about a subject specific to a user, as it is stored in database
// ? should this be public?

id.description: Unique id to the related subject

confidenceLevel.description: A rating of how confident a user feels in the subject, the numbers

detail.description: Detail of the users experience with the subject

rawRequest.description: The raw request handled by the callable.

instanceIdToken.description: An unverified token for a Firebase Instance ID.

auth.description: The result of decoding and verifying a Firebase Auth ID token.

FirebaseCallableFunctionContext.description:
The interface for metadata for the API as passed to the handler.
Provided automatically by Firebase.
Duplicated from firebase for TSOA compatibility.

LinkedTutorData.description: Data about a tutor from the perspective of a student, as it is stored in database

id.description: Id of the tutor related to the student

PrivateStudentData.description: Schema of data that represents a student, as it is stored in database

imageUrl.description: Link to profile image, if defined

Optional text for users to introduce themselves,
describe their experience, what subjects they are interested in etc

userName.description: Username which will be displayed for a user

email.description: Email to allow users to start communicating

Links to subjects a user is interested in learning/teaching (depends on type of user)
and user specific information about the user relating to a specific subject

GenericSubjectData.description:
Represents a subject in every language, ie not dependent on locale.
This is used to map high level relationships between subjects e.g.
the "Maths" generic subject could be related to the "Physics" generic subject
where "Physics" and "Physiques" both belong to the "Physics" generic subject

relatedCategories.description: The categories this generic subject belongs to

relatedSubjects.description:
Links to other relevant subjects a user might be interested in
`// todo needs to be syncronised ie if A is related to B then B must be related to A`

post.description: Retreives data about a tutor user. If the tutor user owns the data then they get all the data, otherwise it is restricted to 'public' data.
Retreives data about a student user. If the student user owns the data then they get all the data, otherwise it is restricted to 'public' data.
Retreives data about a tutor user. If the tutor user owns the data then they get all the data, otherwise it is restricted to 'public' data.
